title: Seeking Alternatives
author: Sumathi Reddy
description: Traditional medicine be damned: There must be an easier solution. In Queens, there is no shortage of alternatives—from South Asian homeopathic doctors in Jackson Heights to the Latino botanicas that run up and down Roosevelt Avenue to the traditional Chinese herbalists in Flushing.
cleaned_text: Updated January 13, 2012 It's that time of the year when the subway is like a human Petri dish and everyone and their brother is hacking, sneezing and getting their grody germs in your face.
